info.+content: Ikkyu is a little boy training to be a monk at Ankokuji Temple. Known for being mischievous and a bit of a troublemaker, but also extremely smart, Ikkyu constantly thinks of new ways to outwit his frustrated teachers, helping others at the same time.
"Tonchinkanchin Ikkyū-san" (とんちんかんちん一休さん) by Megumi Aiuchi and Young Fresh
"Hahaue-sama" (ははうえさま) by Toshiko Fujita
